animeTitle: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Xi Qi Yangyang Guo She Nian
otherNames: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf Movie 5: The Mythical Ark - Adventures in Love & Happiness, 喜羊羊与灰太狼之喜气羊羊过蛇年, The Mythical Ark: Adventures in Love & Happiness
synopsis: In the face of impending disaster, the animal world is looking to the Mythical Ark for salvation. The problem is that only the snake tribe can operate the ark, and the snakes have already escaped to Utopia. To save the animals, Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf travel to Utopia to convince the snakes to help. In the process, they become friends, and the snakes agree to help. However, Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf decide to stay behind to save their homes.
